page.title: 08ATTITUDES OF THE PUBLIC.
page.content: The Chasetown public thought the police did a good job as far as they could, but believed there should be more police on the beat in Chasetown. The local police take an active part in the community and run a Police Youth Activity Scheme in summer, organising coach trips, games, sports and coaching activities. The main kind of transport used by police at Chasetown Police Station is the Ford Escort car.This is often called a "panda" car.The cars are changed every two or three years.The Police have to respond as quickly as possible to about two or three emergency calls per week.Detailed information on numbers of cars and staff is classified.
